hirondelle.starfield.physics

Class StarfieldImage

  • Object
    • hirondelle.starfield.physics.StarfieldImage

  • final class StarfieldImage
extends Object
    Dynamically generate an image of a starfield to an output image file, one star at a time.

    The following data is rendered for each visible star: its magnitude (brightness), color (surface temperature), and position.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StarfieldImage(Projector aProjector, File aOutputFile, int aImageSize, int aMagnification)
      Constructor.

      • Methods inherited from class Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • StarfieldImage

        StarfieldImage(Projector aProjector,
              File aOutputFile,
              int aImageSize,
              int aMagnification)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        aProjector - how to position each star on the image.
        aOutputFile - where the file will be saved on the local file system. The extension of the file name determines the type of file generated - jpg, png, etc. The file format .png seems to give the best results.
        aImageSize - the width (and height) of the image in pixels; the generated image is square. If this is too large, then your host may run out of memory.
        aMagnification - applies only to the half-sky projections. Magnifying to ~6x gives a nice result for high beta.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        void add(BoostedStar aBoostedStar,
       double aPhi)
        Add a boosted star to the generated image.

      • generateFile

        void generateFile()
        Notify this class that no more stars are to be added, and to generate the final file as output. This method calls dispose() at the end.

      • dispose

        void dispose()
        Clean up resources when finished with this object.
